metadata.title: CVE-2019-7582 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The readBytes function in util/read.c in libming through 0.4.8 allowsremote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted swf file thattriggers a memory allocation failure.

criterions.comment: ming: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
